content: I need your help in designing a comprehensive HTML page that can efficiently categorize paper towels based on a multitude of parameters. The page must include the classification of paper towels based on their materials, texture, absorbency, and eco-friendliness. It should incorporate a complex system that takes into account both natural and synthetic components of paper towels. Can you provide me with an HTML code that not only categorizes paper towels but also presents detailed information about each category? I would appreciate it if you could break down the code into multiple steps to make it easier for me to understand.
